messages.subject: Another thought on Saigou & Sagara
messages.msgSnippet: Something else that s been floating in my mind lately is the idea that Saigou didn t necessarily have to have anything against Sagara personally (e.g. Sagara
messages.messageBody:
Something else that's been floating in my mind lately is the idea
that Saigou didn't necessarily have to have anything against Sagara
personally (e.g. Sagara wasn't a threat to Saigou's popularity or
power). He knew Sagara... knew he would follow orders. He would've
had confidence that Sagara would do as he was told and walk into the
perfect set-up to provide them with support from the masses. A
pawn... pure and simple.

phil (who thinks about this WAY too much...)
